template.name: viewForm
template.content:
<%@ page contentType="text/html;charset=UTF-8" %> <%@ include file="/WEB-INF/views/include/taglib.jsp"%>
<title>${functionNameSimple}管理</title> <meta name="decorator" content="easyui"/> <script type="text/javascript">
</script> <form:form id="inputForm" modelAttribute="${className}" action="${r"${ctx}"}/${urlPrefix}/save" method="post" class="form-horizontal">
</form:form>
